channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon revamps Kindle line with faster page turns, AI, and a new green color
item.description: Amazon’s Kindle line seems to go longer and longer between updates. While e-readers aren’t quite the consumer electronics darlings they once were, how...

item.title: Amazon’s New Kindle Lineup Includes the First-Ever Color Kindle
item.description: Amazon just announced four new Kindles, including a revamped Paperwhite, a more capable Scribe, and the first-ever color Kindle.

item.title: Treehouse uses AI to help electricians install tech like EV chargers and heat pumps more cheaply
item.description: The startup seeks to reduce inefficiencies for electricians, including from site visits while quoting jobs. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. Fo...

item.title: Casabrews 5700PRO Review: Exceeding Expectations
item.description: This all-in-one espresso machine delivers on quality with minimal fuss.

item.title: Algorithms Policed Welfare Systems For Years. Now They're Under Fire for Bias
item.description: Human rights groups have launched a new legal challenge against the use of algorithms to detect error and fraud in France's welfare system, amid claim...

item.title: Fable adds cognitive and hearing impairments to its accessibility tools with $25M round
item.description: Fable has gained a reputation as the go-to startup for helping companies build digital products that are more accessible to people with disabilities. ...

item.title: Lightmatter’s $400M round has AI hyperscalers hyped for photonic datacenters
item.description: Photonic computing startup Lightmatter has raised $400 million to blow one of modern datacenters’ bottlenecks wide open. The company’s optical interco...

item.title: Apple Engineers Show How Flimsy AI ‘Reasoning’ Can Be
item.description: The new frontier in large language models is the ability to “reason” their way through problems. New research from Apple says it's not quite what it's...

item.title: Trumpcoin Launches With a Whimper

item.title: Amazon Kindle finally gets color
